basicInfo.title: Basic Details
basicInfo.subtitle: Get started by filling up your contact information.

inputLabels.fullName: Full Name as per your NRIC

default.title: By proceeding, I agree for United Overseas Bank (‘UOB’) and its related corporation (‘UOB Group Members’) or appointed representatives to contact me on this application and/or to inform me on any related services and any promotions.
default.content: United Overseas Bank ('UOB') and its related corporations ('UOB Group Members') or our appointed representatives may contact you via email, voice call or text message to assist in completing the said application. You also consent UOB to collect, use, and disclose your personal data for the purpose of informing you about the product, related services and/or any promotions. This is in addition to any other consent which you may have provided to 'UOB' and 'UOB Group Members' in respect of the collection, use and/or disclosure of your personal data and shall be without prejudice to and does not derogate from the Bank's right to collect, use and/or disclose your personal data under the law.

default.title: Mobile number will be updated for the use of certain banking services including but not limited to UOB Personal Internet Banking, Mobile Services and Alerts.

otp.title: Verify Mobile Number
otp.subtitle: Enter the one-time password (OTP) you received. You can resume your application any time using this verified mobile number.

default.title: Verified mobile number will be updated for the use of certain banking services including but not limited to UOB Personal Internet Banking, Mobile Services and Alerts.

pendingApplication.title: Pending Application(s)
pendingApplication.subtitle: We notice that there is an incomplete application that was previously started. You can retrieve the data filled up in the previous application.

accountDetails.title: Account Details
accountDetails.subtitle: Provide details for selected account.
accountDetails.crossSellSubtitle: Customers who applied for this product also applied for:

inputLabels.cashPlusPlaceholder: Limit will be the same as your CashPlus Limit

CASA.title: Singapore dollar deposits of non-bank depositors and monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the Supplementary Retirement Scheme are insured by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation, for up to S$50,000 in aggregate per depositor per Scheme member by law. Foreign currency deposits, dual currency investments, structured deposits and other investment products are not insured.
CASA.content: Monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the CPF Investment Scheme and CPF Retirement Sum Scheme are aggregated and separately insured up to S$50,000 for each depositor per Scheme member. Refer to UOB/FEB Insured Deposit Register for a list of UOB accounts/ products that are covered under the Scheme.

Card.title: Credit limit will be shared across all your Principle Card(s) with the Bank. I also understand that UOB has the right to grant me a credit limit that is lower than what I have indicated above.
Card.content:
UOB will grant you a credit limit that is lower that what you have indicated because:
  • your aggregate credit limit can only be up to 4x your monthly income or S$200,000, whichever is lower;
  • you have a UOB unsecured credit facility and/or your income documents reflect a lower earned income.
Any credit limit increase will not be applicable to existing Supplementary Cardholder(s), if any, not stated in the application form.

btTableRowTitles: EIR WITH UOB CREDIT CARD (% P.A.)

inputDescription.activateAtms: Access to one of the largest ATM network in Singapore with more than 1,200 ATMs.

termsAndConditions.default: I accept the Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.CURKF: I accept the Terms and Conditions

inputLabels.juniorSaverSubtitle: Provide additional details of your Child.
inputLabels.juniorSaverName: Full name as per Birth Certificate

default.title: I authorise UOB to update my records accordingly with the relevant details as they appear on my NRIC or as provided by me in this application.
default.content:
You confirm that this account is for you and you are the person or individual who ultimately:
  • owns or controls the operation of the account;
  • behind a transaction being conducted.

homeMailingAddress.title: Residential Address
homeMailingAddress.subtitle: Provide a residential address for us to send important mail.

inputLabels.sameHomeMailingAddress: I have a different mailing address.
inputLabels.subtitle2: Provide an alternate mailing address. You will need to upload your latest utility bill for proof of address.

default.title: Residential address refers to the address on your Identity Card (Singaporeans/ PR).

termsAndConditions.sameHomeMailingAddress: Latest utility bill (within 6 months) is required for proof of address if you prefer to receive your mails from UOB to an address other than your residential address.

workInfo.title: Work Details
workInfo.subtitle: Tell us what you do for a living.

uploadDocuments.title: Upload Documents
uploadDocuments.subtitle: It is mandatory to submit these documents for us to process your application.

inputLabels.submitCPFOnline: I authorise CPF to release my statement online to UOB.

inputDescription.uploadDocumentsBillingProof: Upload latest utility bill (within the last 6 months) with your full name and address to verify your mailing address.
inputDescription.uploadWorkPermit: Upload an image of Work Permit
inputDescription.uploadIncomeProof: Provide latest 3 months computerised payslip, Notice of Tax Assessment or 12 months CPF Contribution History Statement.

declaration.title: Declaration
declaration.subtitle: Indicate the Country and Taxpayer Indentification Number (TIN) where you are a resident for tax purposes. Additionally under Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (FATCA), US taxpayers with specified foreign financial assets that exceed certain thresholds must report these assets to the IRS.

inputLabels.residentCardHolder: Hold a US permanent resident card?

tinReasons.0: I have a Tax Identification Number
tinReasons.10: Country does not issue Tax Identification Number
tinReasons.22: Tax Identification Number is yet to be assigned
tinReasons.30: No Tax Identification Number is required

default.title: We are unable to open accounts for US persons that have submitted application online. Visit any of our branches for follow-up.

inputDescription.signature: Upload an image and ensure your signature fits in the white space. Click on confirm. You can use the tools to crop or rotate. (Max file size - 1Mb)
inputDescription.drawSignatureTouch: Touch to sign directly on the screen
inputDescription.usResident: Any person who is physically present in the US for minimum number of days as set out in the Substantial Presence Test defined by US Inland Revenue Services.
inputDescription.usCitizen: Any person who is granted citizenship status by the US Citizenship and Immigration Services.
inputDescription.residentCardHolder: Any person who is granted authorisation to live and work in US on a permanent basis with a Green Card.

termsAndConditions.signature: I authorise UOB to adopt this latest specimen for this account. UOB will use your existing signature specimen if no new upload is provided.
termsAndConditions.signatureContent: If you have an existing UOB Current Account, Savings Account, Gold/Silver Savings Account or Time/Fixed Deposit Accounts (collectively, Existing Deposits Account(s)), the specimen signature of your latest account opened with the Bank will be used as the specimen signature for this new account. If you do not have an Existing Deposits Account, the specimen signature uploaded will be used as specimen signature for this new account.

summary.title: Confirmation
summary.subtitle: Take a final look at the details that you have provided to confirm everything is in order.

termsAndConditions.mainPoint: By proceeding, I confirm that I have read, understood and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions stated:
bulletedPoint: I hereby confirm the information provided above is true, accurate and complete as at the date of application.
I further agree that I shall furnish the Bank with all necessary information and supporting documents as may be requested by ‘UOB’ to process this application.
I acknowledge that ‘UOB’ may choose to either approve or reject this application and I agree that the Bank does not need to provide a reason for the Bank’s approval or rejection.

I undertake to submit a suitably updated form within 30 days of any change in circumstances which affects the tax residency status of the Account Holder or Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act ('FATCA') or where any information contained herein to become incorrect.

I have read and understood the declaration and authorisation for the Application of New Account and/or Service(s) and the Application of Credit/Debit Cards. I affirm the declarations and agree to abide and be bound by the matters stated therein.
PDPAContent: I would like to be kept informed of promotions, offers, products and/or services marketed by the Bank and its related corporations ('UOB Group Members') and I hereby give my consent to any UOB Group Member to contact me via all modes of communication (voice calls, SMS/MMS, fax) using my telephone numbers in your records. I agree that any consent given is additional to any other consent which I may have previously provided to UOB Group Members to inform me of marketing information; and does not supersede any rights which the UOB Group Members may have at law to collect, use and disclose my personal data.

leftPanel.title: Successfully Submitted
leftPanel.subtitle: You have successfully applied for:
leftPanel.submitCPFOnlineSub: You are required to authorise CPF to release your statement online to UOB at the confirmation page in order for UOB to process this application. This will open the CPF service in a new browser tab. You will need a valid SingPass. Visit this link if you do not have one.

body.content: Sign up for Bank User name and password
Transfer money digitally using UOB Mighty or deposit physically at the largest ATM network in Singapore with more than 1,200 ATMs
Access to the largest ATM network in Singapore with more than 1,200 ATMs
